title: How to Create a Fake Vial of Poison

steps.headline: Get an old jar that's big or small (a jar of Tabasco sauce works well.)
Fill it about halfway with water.
Put the desired amount of food coloring in it.
steps.description: Shake it to combine the ingredients.

steps.headline: Add a label.
steps.description: Print or draw the hazard sign as well as the word POISON on a piece of paper and paste it on the bottle of fake poison.

steps.headline: Find a container or bottle to store your fake poison.
Pour some water or milk into the bottle.
Add some more water if you want your fake poison to be a little transparent and a little more milk if you want it to be opaque.
Add some food coloring.You can choose any color but green looks great.
steps.description: You can also decide how many drops of food coloring based on the preference of the darkness of your fake poison.

steps.headline: Put some soap inside.
steps.description: When you want some bubbles, you can shake the bottle.

steps.headline: Add a label.
steps.description: Print or draw the hazard sign as well as the word POISON on a piece of paper and paste it on the bottle of fake poison.

steps.headline: Use when needed.
steps.description: Hold or carry as part of your costume. Shake to combine and make bubbles. Place some dry ice inside at the bottom of your bottle for a steam effect.
